means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 朗德绰号，胖子，来源于中世纪英语、古法语，含义是“胖，圆”(fat,round)

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些词均有"在周围，在附近"之意。
means: about ：既可表静态，也可表动态。
around ：主要用于美国，静态或动态均可。
round ：主要用于英国，多半指动态。

word_mean: round-trip gain   指环行腔内的增益。
round-trip gain   指法布里-珀罗共振腔内的增益。

sentence.Network_en: It was just then that I chanced to look round.
sentence.Network_cn: 就在那时，我恰好环顾了下四周。

sentence.Network_en: I shivered and pulled my scarf more tightly round my neck.
sentence.Network_cn: 我打了个寒战，用围巾把脖子围得更紧了。

sentence.Network_en: He tramped hurriedly round the lake towards the garden.
sentence.Network_cn: 他匆匆地迈着沉重的步伐绕过湖边向花园走去。

jx.jx_en_mean: To seek out and bring together; gather.
To herd (cattle) together from various places.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 赶拢：把（牛群）从不同的地方赶到一块儿

jx.jx_en_mean: (of a story or joke) be passed on from person to person
on all sides or in all directions; surrounding someone or something

lj.lj_ly: everything round about was covered with snow.
lj.lj_ls: 周围的一切都被雪覆盖了。

jx.jx_en_mean: at a point or time approximately equal to
make the edges or corners of something smooth

lj.lj_ly: round off the spars with a soft plastic fitting.
lj.lj_ls: 用软的塑料工具把晶石修圆磨光。

lj.lj_ly: his father insisted he went to university to round out his education.
lj.lj_ls: 他的父亲坚持要他上大学来圆满完成他的教育。

jx.jx_en_mean: drive or collect a number of people or animals together for a particular purpose
jx.jx_cn_mean: 集拢（分散的人)，赶拢；驱拢（牲口）

lj.lj_ly: in the afternoon the cows are rounded up for milking.
lj.lj_ls: 下午牛被驱拢在一起挤奶。

jx.jx_en_mean: With the stage in the center of the audience.
Fully shaped so as to stand free of a background
jx.jx_cn_mean: 形状完整并可脱离背景的

jx.jx_en_mean: To go from place to place, as on business or for entertainment
jx.jx_cn_mean: 巡回：从一地到另一地，如巡回出差或旅行

lj.lj_ly: a delivery truck making the rounds; students going the rounds in the entertainment district.
lj.lj_ls: 挨户送货的卡车；逐一在娱乐区玩耍的学生

jx.jx_en_mean: To be communicated or passed from person to person
jx.jx_cn_mean: 在众人中传播：一个人接一个人的传播

lj.lj_ly: The news quickly made the rounds. A piece of juicy gossip is going the rounds.
lj.lj_ls: 消息很快就传开了；生动的闲话正传播开去

phrase.cizu_name: make the rounds 或 go the rounds

means.word_mean: 圆的,圆形的;球形的
其他释义
圆形的;环绕地
其他释义

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from the Old French stem round-, from a variant of Latin rotundus 'rotund'

encyclopedia.content: 1 轮唱曲round 用同度或八度卡农手法写成的声乐曲 轮唱曲，定义 轮唱曲，意义 轮唱曲 - 轮唱曲 （轮唱曲，轮唱曲） 歌唱演唱形式之一。所有声部都按同一旋律，但非同时出现，而是按一定时距先後歌唱，各声部相互追逐而又交叠出现，构成良好的和声效果。例如 冼星海 的《黄河大合唱》中的《保卫黄河》。 2 Round函数（银行家舍入） Round 函数即四舍六入五取偶。 Round 函数在MSDN里的中文释义为四舍五入，这是翻译时的疏忽。 在 V

usage_note.note: Round is an adverb and preposition that has the same meanings as ‘around’. Round is often used with verbs of movement, such as ‘walk’ and ‘drive’, and also in phrasal verbs such as ‘get round’ and ‘hand round’. Round is commoner in British English than American English, and it is slightly more informal.
usage_note.translation: round用作副词和介词时与around同义。round常与表示动作的动词连用，如walk和drive，同时也可以用在get round和hand round之类的动词词组中。round在英国英语中比在美国英语中更常用，且略显不正式。

entry.def: To be positioned round a place or object means to surround it or be on all sides of it. To move round a place means to go along its edge, back to the point where you started.

example.ex: They were sitting round the kitchen table...
example.tran: 他们正围坐在餐桌旁。

example.ex: The nightdress has handmade lace round the armholes and neckline...
example.tran: 这件女式睡衣的袖孔和领口都镶着一圈手织花边。

entry.def: If you move round a corner or obstacle, you move to the other side of it. If you look round a corner or obstacle, you look to see what is on the other side.

example.ex: Suddenly a car came round a corner on the opposite side...
example.tran: 突然，对面的街角处拐过一辆汽车。

example.ex: Stay on the left-hand pavement to follow a road downhill round a curve...
example.tran: 继续顺着左边的人行道拐一个弯，然后沿路下山。

entry.def: You use round to say that something happens in or relates to different parts of a place, or is near a place.

example.ex: He happens to own half the land round here...
example.tran: 他恰好拥有这里一半的土地。

example.ex: I think he has earned the respect of leaders all round the world...
example.tran: 我想他已经赢得了世界各国领导人的尊重。

entry.def: If a wheel or object spins round, it turns on its axis.

example.ex: Holes can be worn remarkably quickly by a wheel going round at 60mph...
example.tran: 以每小时60英里的速度前进的车轮很快就会磨出洞来。

example.ex: Stars appeared everywhere, spinning round and round, faster and faster.
example.tran: 满眼金星乱转，而且越转越快。

entry.def: If you turn round, you turn so that you are facing or going in the opposite direction.

example.ex: She paused, but did not turn round...
example.tran: 她停了一下，但是并没有转身。

example.ex: The end result was that the ship had to turn round, and go back to Djibouti...
example.tran: 最后的结果是这艘船不得不掉转方向，驶回吉布提。

entry.def: If you move things round, you move them so they are in different places.

example.ex: He will be glad to refurnish where possible, change things round and redecorate...
example.tran: 他会很乐意尽可能添置些家具，把东西挪一挪，然后重新装饰。

example.ex: I've already moved things round a bit to make it easier for him.
example.tran: 我已经把东西挪了挪，好让他更方便。

entry.def: If you hand or pass something round, it is passed from person to person in a group.

example.ex: John handed round the plate of sandwiches.
example.tran: 约翰把那盘三明治传给大家。

example.ex: ...as the whiskey bottle is passed round.
example.tran: 当大家传递威士忌酒瓶的时候

entry.def: If you go round to someone's house, you visit them.

example.ex: I think we should go round and tell Kevin to turn his music down...
example.tran: 我觉得我们应该去凯文家让他把音乐的声音调小一些。

example.ex: He came round with a bottle of champagne.
example.tran: 他带着一瓶香槟过来了。

entry.def: You use round in informal expressions such as sit round or hang round when you are saying that someone is spending time in a place and is not doing anything very important.

example.ex: As we sat round chatting, I began to think I'd made a mistake...
example.tran: 当我们坐在那里聊天时，我开始认为自己犯了一个错误。

example.ex: I was running round all hyped up.
example.tran: 我兴奋地跑来跑去。

entry.def: If something is built or based round a particular idea, that idea is the basis for it.

example.ex: That was for a design built round an existing American engine...
example.tran: 那是用在以现有的一种美国发动机为基础的设计之上的。

example.ex: The core of the Festival's programme centres round performances of new and 20th century work.
example.tran: 这个音乐节最重要的节目以演奏20世纪的作品和新作为主。

entry.def: If you get round a problem or difficulty, you find a way of dealing with it.

example.ex: Don't just immediately give up but think about ways round a problem...
example.tran: 不要马上放弃，应该想想解决问题的办法。

example.ex: There are ways of getting round most things!
example.tran: 有几种可以解决大多数问题的方法。

entry.def: If you win someone round, or if they come round, they change their mind about something and start agreeing with you.

example.ex: He did his best to talk me round, but I wouldn't speak to him...
example.tran: 他竭力想要说服我改变主意，但是我不愿意跟他讲话。

example.ex: The Chandler twins were coming round to the same opinion.
example.tran: 钱德勒家的这对双胞胎也最终统一了意见。

entry.tran: （用于描述以前发生过或定期发生的事情）
entry.def: You use round in expressions such as this time round or to come round when you are describing something that has happened before or things that happen regularly.

example.ex: In the past, the elections have been marked by hundreds of murders, but this time round the violence has been much more limited...
example.tran: 在过去，这些选举中总是会发生数百起谋杀案，但这一次暴力事件已经非常少了。

example.ex: Of course, it isn't the same first time round...
example.tran: 当然，这不同于第一次了。

entry.def: You can use round to give the measurement of the outside of something that is shaped like a circle or a cylinder.

example.ex: I'm about two inches larger round the waist.
example.tran: 我的腰围大概粗了两英寸。

example.ex: ...forty-eight inches round the hips.
example.tran: 臀围48英寸

entry.def: You use round in front of times or amounts to indicate that they are approximate.

example.ex: I go to bed round 11:00 at night.
example.tran: 我大约晚上11点上床睡觉。

entry.def: In spoken English, round about means approximately.

example.ex: Round about one and a half million people died.
example.tran: 大概有150万人死亡。

example.ex: ...a system that was abolished round about 1902.
example.tran: 大约在1902年被废除的制度

entry.def: You say all round to emphasize that something affects all parts of a situation or all members of a group.

example.ex: It ought to make life much easier all round...
example.tran: 它应该会让生活的方方面面都变得更加方便。

example.ex: Nerves are frayed all round.
example.tran: 每一根神经都绷紧了。

entry.def: If you say that something is going round and round in your head, you mean that you can't stop thinking about it.

example.ex: It all keeps going round and round in my head till I don't know where I am.
example.tran: 这一直在我脑海里萦绕，直到我不知身在何处。

entry.def: If something happens all year round, it happens throughout the year.

example.ex: Many of these plants are evergreen, so you can enjoy them all year round...
example.tran: 这些植物中有很多都是四季常青的，所以一年到头都可以观赏。

example.ex: It's a treat to be enjoyed all the year round.
example.tran: 这是全年都能享受到的款待。

entry.tran: 一连串，一系列，一轮(相关的事件，尤指相继发生的事件)
entry.def: A round of events is a series of related events, especially one which comes after or before a similar series of events.

example.ex: It was agreed that another round of preliminary talks would be held in Peking...
example.tran: 经协商，新一轮的预备会谈将在北京举行。

example.ex: This is the latest round of job cuts aimed at making the company more competitive...
example.tran: 这是旨在增强公司竞争力的新一轮裁员。

entry.def: In sport, a round is a series of games in a competition. The winners of these games go on to play in the next round, and so on, until only one player or team is left.

example.ex: ...in the third round of the Pilkington Cup...
example.tran: 在皮尔金顿杯的第3轮比赛中

example.ex: After round three, two Americans share the lead.
example.tran: 第3轮比赛结束后，两名美国选手领先。

entry.def: In a boxing or wrestling match, a round is one of the periods during which the boxers or wrestlers fight.

example.ex: He was declared the victor in the 11th round...
example.tran: 在第11回合中，他被宣布获胜。

example.ex: Gibson's left eye is completely closed before the end of round one.
example.tran: 在第一回合结束前，吉布森的左眼完全闭上了。

entry.def: A round of golf is one game, usually including 18 holes.

example.ex: ...two rounds of golf...
example.tran: 两场高尔夫球赛

example.ex: Ronan Rafferty shot six birdies in a round of 67.
example.tran: 罗南·拉弗蒂在成绩为67杆的一场比赛中打出了6次小鸟球。

entry.def: A round is a circular shape.

example.ex: ...small fresh rounds of goats' cheese...
example.tran: 新鲜的小块圆形山羊奶酪

example.ex: A cucumber was sliced into rounds.
example.tran: 黄瓜被切成了圆片。

entry.def: A round of bread is a slice of bread. A round of sandwiches is a sandwich made from two slices of bread.

example.ex: ...four rounds of toast.
example.tran: 4片吐司

entry.def: If you do your rounds or your round, you make a series of visits to different places or people, for example as part of your job.

example.ex: The consultants still did their morning rounds...
example.tran: 这些顾问们上午仍然四处走访。

example.ex: He got out of the car, and carried on with his paper round.
example.tran: 他下了汽车，继续带着文件四处拜访。

entry.def: If you buy a round of drinks, you buy a drink for each member of the group of people that you are with.

example.ex: They sat on the clubhouse terrace, downing a round of drinks...
example.tran: 他们坐在俱乐部会所的露台上，大口喝着别人请的饮料。

example.ex: I think it's my round.
example.tran: 我想这轮该我请了。

entry.def: A round of ammunition is the bullet or bullets released when a gun is fired.

example.ex: ...firing 1650 rounds of ammunition during a period of ten minutes.
example.tran: 在10分钟之内打出了1,650发子弹

example.ex: ...the use of live rounds of ammunition.
example.tran: 使用未引爆的弹药

entry.def: If there is a round of applause, everyone claps their hands to welcome someone or to show that they have enjoyed something.

example.ex: Sue got a sympathetic round of applause.
example.tran: 休得到了一片赞成的掌声。

entry.def: In music, a round is a simple song sung by several people in which each person sings a different part of the song at the same time.

entry.tran: (故事、想法或玩笑)传播，流传，传开
entry.def: If a story, idea, or joke is going the rounds or doing the rounds, a lot of people have heard it and are telling it to other people.

example.ex: This story was going the rounds 20 years ago.
example.tran: 20年前，这个故事广为流传。

entry.def: If you make the rounds or do the rounds, you visit a series of different places.

example.ex: After school, I had picked up Nick and Ted and made the rounds of the dry cleaner and the grocery store...
example.tran: 放学以后，我接了尼克和特德，然后又去了干洗店和杂货店。

example.ex: We could do the rounds of the galleries.
example.tran: 我们可以逐一参观各个画廊。

entry.def: Something that is round is shaped like a circle or ball.

example.ex: She had small feet and hands and a flat, round face.
example.tran: 她的手脚都很小，脸又扁又圆。

example.ex: ...the round church known as The New Temple.
example.tran: 被称为“新教堂”的球形教堂

entry.def: If someone has round eyes, their eyes are open wide, for example because they are surprised, excited, or afraid.

example.ex: The boy sucked his thumb and stared at Hebburn with huge, round eyes.
example.tran: 男孩吮吸着拇指，瞪圆了大眼睛盯着赫本。

entry.tran: 整数的，不计尾数的(以10的倍数表示)
entry.def: A round number is a multiple of 10, 100, 1000, and so on. Round numbers are used instead of precise ones to give the general idea of a quantity or proportion.

example.ex: A million pounds seemed a suitably round number.
example.tran: 100万英镑看起来是一个比较合适的整数。

example.ex: The money goes into the team pool, which this summer, in round figures, has now reached £18,000.
example.tran: 钱都存入小组的集体基金，到今年夏天基金的整数已经达到了18,000英镑。

entry.def: If you round a place or obstacle, you move in a curve past the edge or corner of it.

example.ex: The house disappeared from sight as we rounded a corner...
example.tran: 我们绕过街角就看不到那座房子了。

example.ex: After rounding Cape Finisterre the boats ride the north-easterly trades.
example.tran: 绕过菲尼斯特雷角之后，这些船开始在东北信风的吹送下破浪前行。

entry.def: If you round an amount up or down, or if you round it off, you change it to the nearest whole number or nearest multiple of 10, 100, 1000 and so on.

example.ex: We needed to do decimals to round up and round down numbers...
example.tran: 我们得把小数四舍五入成整数。

example.ex: The fraction was then multiplied by 100 and rounded to the nearest half or whole number...
example.tran: 然后，分数被乘以100，取整为最接近的半数或整数。

means.word_mean: 1. a charge of ammunition for a single shot
2. an interval during which a recurring sequence of events occurs;
3. a regular route for a sentry or policeman;

sentences.sentence: "in the old days a policeman walked a beat and knew all his people by name"

means.word_mean: 4. (often plural) a series of professional calls (usually in a set order);

sentences.sentence: "the doctor goes on his rounds first thing every morning"
"we enjoyed our round of the local bars"

means.word_mean: 5. the activity of playing 18 holes of golf;

sentences.sentence: "a round of golf takes about 4 hours"

means.word_mean: 6. the usual activities in your day;
7. (sports) a period of play during which one team is on the offensive
8. the course along which communications spread;

sentences.sentence: "the story is going the rounds in Washington"

means.word_mean: 9. a serving to each of a group (usually alcoholic);
10. a cut of beef between the rump and the lower leg
11. a partsong in which voices follow each other; one voice starts and others join in one after another until all are singing different parts of the song at the same time;
12. an outburst of applause;
13. a crosspiece between the legs of a chair
14. any circular or rotating mechanism;
1. wind around; move along a circular course;
2. make round;
3. be around;
4. pronounce with rounded lips
5. attack in speech or writing;

sentences.sentence: "The editors of the left-leaning paper attacked the new House Speaker"

means.word_mean: 6. bring to a highly developed, finished, or refined state;
7. express as a round number;
8. become round, plump, or shapely;
1. having a circular shape
2. (of sounds) full and rich;
3. (of numbers) to the nearest ten, hundred, or thousand;
1. from beginning to end; throughout;

sentences.sentence: "It rains all year round on Skye"

auth_sentence.content: But in the fifth round he just went down.
auth_sentence.res_content: But in the fifth round he just went down.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But in the fifth round he just went down.

auth_sentence.content: His movement, finishing and all-round ability are outstanding.
auth_sentence.res_content: His movement, finishing and all-round ability are outstanding.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His movement, finishing and all-round ability are outstanding.

auth_sentence.content: Here some rain can occur all the year round.
auth_sentence.res_content: Here some rain can occur all the year round.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Here some rain can occur all the year round.

stems_affixes.word_buile: round轮子,转,滚→adj. 圆的 n.圆形物；一轮 prep.围绕 adv.在周围
round轮子,转,滚+about左右,周围→adj. 迂回的，转弯抹角的 n.环状交叉路

stems_affixes.value_cn: 周围, 四周, 到处, 大约, 左右
stems_affixes.word_buile: a在……+round围绕,在周围→adv.周围, 四周, 到处, 大约, 左右 prep.在……周围, 四处
round轮子,转,滚→adj. 圆的 n.圆形物；一轮 prep.围绕 adv.在周围
round轮子,转,滚→adj. 圆的 n.圆形物；一轮 prep.围绕 adv.在周围
round轮子,转,滚+about左右,周围→adj. 迂回的，转弯抹角的 n.环状交叉路
a在……+round围绕,在周围→adv.周围, 四周, 到处, 大约, 左右 prep.在……周围, 四处
round轮子,转,滚→adj. 圆的 n.圆形物；一轮 prep.围绕 adv.在周围

Sentence.sentence: What time would suit you for the first round talks with John Smith
The question is often asked whether every butterfly makes the round trip journey every year.
The picture worsens with each round of El Nino, the unusually warm currents in the Pacific Ocean that drive up temperatures and invariably presage (预示) droughts and fires in the rain forest.
Indeed, there does seem to be a demand for the more rounded leaders such diversity might create.

means.word_mean: 圆形的, 球形的

sentences.en: The child had a round face.
sentences.cn: 那孩子脸蛋圆润。

sentences.en: The area was perfectly round.
sentences.cn: 那区域完全是圆形的。

means.word_mean: 滚圆的, 丰满的

sentences.en: He was a short and round man.
sentences.cn: 他是个矮胖的男人。

means.word_mean: 用整数表示的, 取整数的, 整数的, 尾数是 0 （或 5）的

sentences.en: Give me a round dozen and I'll pay in cash.
sentences.cn: 给我一整打, 我将付现金。

sentences.en: What he said is a round lie.
sentences.cn: 他所说的是十足的谎话。

means.word_mean: 绕圈子; 围绕地; 旋转; 环绕; 兜圈子

sentences.en: The horse is running round the field.
sentences.cn: 马在场上兜着圈子跑。

means.word_mean: 在周围; 在附近; 围绕

sentences.en: A crowd soon gathered round.
sentences.cn: 一群人很快围了上来。

sentences.en: He visited all the people round.
sentences.cn: 他访问了附近所有的人。

means.word_mean: 到各处

sentences.en: Let me show you round.
sentences.cn: 让我领你到处转转。

means.word_mean: 去某地点

sentences.en: He invited us round for drinks.
sentences.cn: 他请我们到家里喝几杯。

means.word_mean: 到处, 各处, 逐一地, 挨个地

sentences.en: I haven't got enough candies to go round.
sentences.cn: 我没有足够的糖果可让每人都分到。

means.word_mean: 朝反方向; 调转方向; 转过来

sentences.en: Turn the picture round to face the wall.
sentences.cn: 把画转过去面对墙。

means.word_mean: 大约, 大概

sentences.en: It was the face of a man round fifty.
sentences.cn: 那是一个五十岁光景的男人。

means.word_mean: (表示位置)在…四周, 围绕于…; 向[在]…各处, 遍及; 在…附近

sentences.en: They swarmed close round her to hear.
sentences.cn: 他们挤在她的周围听着。

sentences.en: He lives in a village round the town.
sentences.cn: 他住在这个小镇附近的一个村庄里。

means.word_mean: (表示时间)从…的开始到结束; 在…整个期间

sentences.en: The shops are always crowded with people all round the year.
sentences.cn: 商店一年到头总是挤满了人。

means.word_mean: (表示方向)环绕, 围绕; 往[在]…的另一边, 绕过

sentences.en: It was a mile by water, four miles round the shore.
sentences.cn: 由水路去只有一英里, 沿岸绕行要四英里。

means.word_mean: (表示状态)团结在…周围, 跟随着

sentences.en: The reformer soon gathered a band of followers round him.
sentences.cn: 改革者很快就获得一群追随者支持他。

means.word_mean: (表示论及)关于…的解决办法[途径]

sentences.en: There are several solutions round this.
sentences.cn: 关于这一点有几个解决办法。

means.word_mean: 圆(片)形食物; 圆; 圆形物

sentences.en: Cut the pastry into small rounds, one for each pie.
sentences.cn: 把油酥面团切成小圆片, 每个馅饼用一片。

sentences.en: These are ６ whole rounds of bread.
sentences.cn: 这些是六整份的面包。

means.word_mean: 一回合, 一局, 一场

sentences.en: Each round of the boxing match lasts three minutes.
sentences.cn: 拳击比赛每回合时间是三分钟。

means.word_mean: 一连串, 一系列, 一套, 一组; 一阵; 一系列常规活动; 惯常的活动

sentences.en: A round of parties ushered in the New Year.
sentences.cn: 一系列的晚会迎来了新年。

sentences.en: His speech won round after round of enthusiastic applause.
sentences.cn: 他的演讲博得了一阵又一阵的热烈掌声。

means.word_mean: 巡视(路线); 巡回(路线)

sentences.en: The night watchman makes the rounds of the building every hour.
sentences.cn: 巡夜人员每小时都巡视这建筑物。

means.word_mean: (使)成圆形

sentences.en: The children's eyes rounded with excitement.
sentences.cn: 小孩子们兴奋得瞪圆了眼睛。

means.word_mean: 绕行

sentences.en: The bear rounded and faced the hunters.
sentences.cn: 熊转过身, 面对着猎人。

sentences.en: He rounded a corner and walked into a narrow street.
sentences.cn: 他拐过弯走进一条狭窄的街道。

jushi.english: He is clever enough to have made such a round guess.
jushi.chinese: 他作出了如此完整的猜测,真够聪明的了。

jushi.english: What he said is a round lie.
jushi.chinese: 他所说的是十足的谎话。

jushi.english: Give me a round dozen and I'll pay in cash.
jushi.chinese: 给我一整打,我将付现金。
